snippet: A South Carolina police chief who said the mayor fired her because she is gay returned to work on Monday after being reinstated by the town council....

headline.print_headline: Fired Lesbian Police Chief in South Carolina Gets Her Job Back
headline.main: Fired Lesbian Police Chief in South Carolina Gets Her Job Back

lead_paragraph: A South Carolina police chief who said the mayor fired her because she is gay returned to work on Monday after being reinstated by the town council.
